description: 10–18 HD (Large) elves, human druids, and gnomes sometimes use mega- Level Adjustment: — loceroses as mounts; Midgard dwarves use them as pack animals. Their speed and height are particularly useful for This powerful great cat has heavy shoulders, a bobtail, and two scouts and reconnaissance of all kinds. Their gait is fast, huge, curved fangs jutting from its mouth. jarring, and prone to sudden shifts in direction. Training a megaloceros requires four weeks and a suc- Twice as large as a lion, skilled in deadly hunting tactics, cessful DC 20 Handle Animal check.
